name: SteamLensAI
description:

- Replaced Kubernetes with Dask, cutting memory 40%, enabling <1s startup across eight workers on a single GPU
- Deployed on AWS EC2, with 99% GPU use, stable throughput, and reducing hosting costs by 85%

name: NYC Transit Hub
description:

name: CodeBase
description:

name: LocalPilotAI
description:

name: Student Course Recommendation
description:

name: QuantumhealthShield

name: HTTP Client
description:
